did.abstract: This collection contains the records of Holy Trinity Polish National Catholic Church, New Castle, Pa., 1914-1979. It contains a combined church record book, parish board minute book, and miscellaneous newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the records of Holy Trinity Polish National Catholic Church, New Castle, Pa., 1914-1979. Series I contains the combined church record, 1914-1979. This series includes a register, and baptism, marriage, 1st comunion, confirmation, and death records (in Polish and English). Series II contains a Parish Board Minute Book, 1916-1936 (in Polish). Series III contains miscellaneous newspaper clippings, 1964-1979, about the church and its members (in Polish and English).

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Originally microfilmed by Slippery Rock State College Archives in June 1979. Positive copy of microfilm made by the Archives of Industrial Society in 1980.
